answers.answer: And yesterday I had flu like symptoms the whole day and night I felt like I was going to die. I couldn't see properly for 3 hours as well my eyesight was hazzy and my jaw has been aching for 8 weeks too. My white in my eyes is an off white color almost brown and yellow in color.

I am surprised that you have seen 3 doctors and they have done nothing for you.You do need to go back to the doctor for a full examination and investigation.  With you saying that the whites of your eyes are almost brown and yellow in colour indicates that you have jaundice which is a liver problem.  Your doctor should take blood tests to check for liver and kidney function, as well as anaemia.  Having a swollen and sore tongue can be a sign of anaemia.  And you may require iron supplements.  Having hazy vision can be a sign of diabetes when the sugar levels in the blood are too high.If you drink alcohol, this has to stop.  Alcohol damages the liver as well as killing off brain cells.  Drink more water and diluted fruit juices, but keep off the orange juice in case this is triggering off your migraines.Excessive weight gain as well as eating too many calories than your body requires, can be from some illnesses like diabetes and hypothyroidism (underactive thyroid).You may also have a fungal problem if your nipples are not healing.  Did you not get anything from any of the doctors for this?  Skin problems can be another sign of diabetes.  If you were not prescribed anything for the chapped nipple, you can apply Sudocrem which you can buy from the pharmacy or big supermarkets, if that does not help, then you will need to look at getting an antifungal cream like canesten.  The pharmacist may be able to assist you with this.Migraine headaches can be triggered off by certain foods, chocolate, coffee, oranges, red wine, cheese.  So avoid these foods and keep a diary to find out if there are any other foods that may be triggering off your migraines.You really need to be examined by the medical profession urgently.  You have too many things not right.If you are too unwell to make an appointment, ask for a home visit.I do not know what the procedure is about admitting yourself to A&E, but referral to a specialist is usually through a doctor.

Thanks so much, no I don't drink alcohol at all. I took a blood test for liver cancer almost 2 weeks ago and still haven't got the results back, my thyroid was normal. You have given me so much more info than the doctors, so thank you very much.
The blood results should be through by now.If you have had these done through the doctor, phone the surgery and ask and also make an appointment.Best of luck.

No they are still not back yet, I've never had to wait this long for results, when I rang the surgery again on Friday the receptionist said not back but it's noted investigation on the computer. So have no idea what's going on. But thanks again Gemma.

No they are still not back yet, I've never had to wait this long for results, when I rang the surgery again on Friday the receptionist said not back but it's noted investigation on the computer. So have no idea what's going on. But thanks again Jenna.

No they are still not back yet, I've never had to wait this long for results, when I rang the surgery again on Friday the receptionist said not back but it's noted investigation on the computer. So have no idea what's going on. But thanks again Jemma.

question: Hi can someone please tell me what may be wrong, yes I've been to 3 doctors. Past 8 weeks, itchy sore chaffed left nipple, very sore lower back before getting out of bed and lasts most days, too much saliva, teeth marks on both sides of tongue, feeling of tongue swollen, migraines but worse when I wake up in morning, feeling like a belt around my throat when sitting up in bed, aching legs spasm as soon as I lay down at night, no energy, lethargic, irritable, anger issues, excessive weight gain, when using a tampon the last 3 times if I move sudden urine leaks, not a little but a lot, even when I have been to the toilet, so so tired. I have hepatitis c for 10 years. Please throw some ideas at me someone. IM 35 years old I take magnesium, b12, vitamin d, multi vitamin. I do have hernia in my stomach above belly button which is hurting again.
title: Answers for symptoms
